name: Underbelly
description:
Plot

The year is 1966. When Inspector Warren arrives at the Hastings' Baptist Mining Community, he finds that all is not up to federal standards. When Warren refuses to take a cash bribe to give the Mine a passing grade, the greedy Director Hastings triggers a cave-in during Warren's investigation. A nearby miner calls out to Warren, telling him to delve deeper to reach the main shaft elevator to secure his escape. The inspector is equipped for basic mine operations but not for mine rescue, so they are on their own after the tunnel collapses. Along the way, Warren finds tape recordings left by miners who secretly sent for his presence at the mine.

Game Credits

Programming: Bryan Ambriz, Ryan Lamb

Art: Calvin Tran, Billy Deloe, Nng Cindyana, Jaye Kimzey

Rigging: Jaye Kimzey

Level Design: Boudicca Minchin

Narrative: Boudicca Minchin, Jay Story

Sound: Kendrick Haskins (Music and SFX), Boudicca Minchin (SFX), Martha Diaz (guitar on credits track)

Actors: Inspector - Jay Story; Director - Eric Brock; Miners - Bryan Ambriz, Owen Austin Donoho, Daniel Domingo
